text: Bobby Martin (May 4, 1930 – September 6, 2013) was an American music producer, arranger and songwriter, closely associated with Philadelphia International Records and Philly soul. Martin received a Grammy Award for Album of the Year for his contribution to the Saturday Night Fever soundtrack. He died in 2013. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1930 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Record producers from California Category:African-American record producers Category:American music arrangers Category:Grammy Award winners Category:Musicians from Ohio Category:Songwriters from Ohio Category:People from Lockland, Ohio
title: Bobby Martin (producer)
